mapper.select: SELECT `cust_id`, `cust_name`, `cust_user_id`, `cust_create_id`, b.dict_item_name `cust_source`, c.dict_item_name `cust_industry`, d.dict_item_name `cust_level`, `cust_linkman`, `cust_phone`, `cust_mobile`, `cust_zipcode`, `cust_address`, `cust_createtime` FROM customer a LEFT JOIN (SELECT dict_id, dict_item_name FROM base_dict WHERE dict_type_code = '001') b ON a.`cust_industry` = b.dict_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT dict_id, dict_item_name FROM base_dict WHERE dict_type_code = '002') c ON a.`cust_industry` = c.dict_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT dict_id, dict_item_name FROM base_dict WHERE dict_type_code = '006') d ON a.`cust_industry` = d.dict_id
